messages.content: ComfyUI Frame Maker is a node that creates a sequence of frames by moving and scaling a subject image over a background image in ComfyUI.
What are the requirements for using ComfyUI Frame Maker?
The requirements for using ComfyUI Frame Maker are ComfyUI and the recommended ComfyUI-Manager extension.
How can you install ComfyUI Frame Maker?
To install ComfyUI Frame Maker, navigate to the custom_nodes directory and run the command: git clone https://github.com/diStyApps/ComfyUI_FrameMaker.git
What is the purpose of the Basic frame maker workflow in ComfyUI Frame Maker?
The Basic frame maker workflow in ComfyUI Frame Maker demonstrates a simple setup for creating a sequence of frames with a moving and scaling subject image over a background.
What does the Basic batch frame maker workflow in ComfyUI Frame Maker show?
The Basic batch frame maker workflow in ComfyUI Frame Maker shows an example of generating multiple frames in a batch process, allowing for efficient creation of animated sequences.
What is the layerdiffusion frame maker workflow in ComfyUI Frame Maker?
The layerdiffusion frame maker workflow in ComfyUI Frame Maker demonstrates the use of the layerdiffusion technique to create more complex and visually appealing frame sequences.
What is the frame maker + splash workflow in ComfyUI Frame Maker?

The frame maker + splash workflow in ComfyUI Frame Maker is an upcoming feature that will showcase the combination of the frame maker node with splash effects to create dynamic and engaging animations.
